sub_title: Senior Systems Architect at Philips Oral Healthcare
summary:
Passionate about innovation and product development. Motivated by work involving a series of non
routine tasks that require social intelligence, complex critical thinking and creative problem solving. Experienced System Architect and Product Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the personal care industry. Strong innovation and development professional skilled in lean six sigma methodology.

awards.title: Winner of Royal Dutch Gas Industry award (KVGN)
awards.description: Winner of the Dutch Industry award for remarkable, special and innovative graduation thesis

awards.title: Granted TU/e Scholarship for the Master’s program
awards.description: Awarded a full scholarship to pursue a master's degree at Eindhoven University of Technology for having exceptional academic record.

profile_positions.description:
Played the role of Platform Architect, Systems Integrator & Systems engineer in the development of the Power toothbrush. Key areas of responsibilities:
- Elaborate and evaluate the developed architecture concepts and propose architecture guidelines or system specifications as support to the start-up of product development projects. These architecture
guidelines are based on proven functions, balanced criteria, and on integral costs including sensitivity analysis for assumptions/uncertainties.
- Documentation of the chosen architecture platform(s) and define requirements for the physical interfaces and modules, including reasoning why & assumptions
- Overall technical lead and responsible for the realization of full systems product release to ensure quality and compliance.
- Translation of user and business requirements into product requirements, high-level product design, check and optimize integration and verification
- System decomposition and allocation of derived requirements down to HW/SW element and part level and related traceability. Trade-off of product/system design specifications and interfaces, determine the feasibility of potential solutions and lead technical & design reviews.
- Ensuring full Product Safety Risk Management in a regulatory-compliant manner.
- Create product development logic and support in project planning
profile_positions.title: Senior Systems Engineer, Oral Health Care

profile_positions.description:
Project management support in particular in the interfacing between hardware product development and the Digital proposition development logic.
Manage interfaces between Digital touch points/Hardware/Firmware and User Interface for large scale & complex product development project.
Manage system requirements: Identify gaps and develop missing requirements
profile_positions.title: Senior Systems Engineer, Male Grooming

profile_positions.description:
Define and create the architecture platform as a blueprint to the future by developing an in-depth understanding of integral product design and underlying manufacturing methods. 
Main tasks and responsibilities:
- Participate and contribute to the programming of the concept development projects. Advice the Innovation Lead on choices related to the roadmap; make or buy, development versus outsourcing.
- Elaborate and evaluate the developed architecture concepts and propose architecture guidelines or system specifications as support to the start-up of product development projects. These architecture guidelines are based on proven functions, on balanced criteria and on integral costs including sensitivity analysis for assumptions / uncertainties.
- Documentation of the chosen architecture platform(s) and define requirements for the physical interfaces and modules, including reasoning why & assumptions
- Deployment of Integrated Architecture throughout the whole organization. Develop and maintain a valuable network with internal and external innovation partners to build out the architecture competences
- Lead, coach, stimulate and supervise team members
- Co-responsible for good cooperation with relevant key-persons from Innovation & Development, Supply and Marketing.
Skills acquired: Value proposition creation, Strong communication and influencing skills, Balancing needs of different stakeholders, Requirement management.
Courses: Structured Architecture, Design For Six Sigma Black belt, Project Management, Influencing others, Lean Basics.
profile_positions.title: System Architect, Male Grooming

profile_positions.description:
Lead a cross functional team of 5 while managing total budget of 400KEuros. The project was scoped to to identify and develop locally relevant requirements for key markets focusing on entry level products to further unlock cost savings. Lean and Design for Six Sigma methodologies were followed. Key achievements:
1. Delivered knowledge and understanding of target consumer needs and expectations, lifetime scenarios and load cases by performing qualitative and quantitative consumer studies.
2. Identified cost saving opportunities for market entry product unlocking savings resulting in significant IGM improvement.
3. Delivered clear and in-depth understanding of low cost competitor on cost, requirements and market performance.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
Developed and provided proof of concept of innovations in personal care electrical appliances according to lean Six Sigma methodology. 
Main roles and responsibilities:
- Understand consumer tensions and translation into product proposition
- Concept creation and testing: simulations, prototyping, mechanical analysis (CAD & FEM), design of experiments (DoE), consumer testing, statistical analysis.
- Technology and industrialization scouting
- Critical-To-Quality specification, tolerance design and capability analysis
- Risk analysis (FMEA)
- Root cause analysis using fishbone and Shainin methodologies
- Analysis and development of measurement systems
- Reports and research documents
- Claim generation and substantiation
- Mentor of 2 master theses candidates and 1 internship
Skills acquired: Consumer knowledge, skin & hair physiology knowledge, strong technical, analytical and communication skills.
Courses: Design For Six Sigma Green belt, Communicating with impact, Open Mind Management, Matlab, lean scheduling.
profile_positions.title: Function Development Engineer

profile_positions.description: Worked on CFD modeling of micro gas turbine combustor in order to optimize the combustion and minimize the emission namely, NOx. The model was verified against few experimental results. Based on the model, design changes were recommended to lower the emissions.
profile_positions.title: MSc Thesis

profile_positions.description: CFD study of flow aerodynamics inside micro gas turbine combustor
profile_positions.title: Internship

profile_positions.description:
project under supervision of  Dr.K V Gangadharan, Prof, Dept. of Mech. Engg, NITK Surathkal.
Leader of the project group of 5 members.
Successfully demonstrated the existence of a critical velocity, velocity beyond which the rate of cooling remains constant for a cooling system.
profile_positions.title: B.Tech Thesis on Design, Analysis and Fabrication of variable speed cooling system

profile_positions.description: Math-modeling, simulation and study of vibration on damaged cantilever beam under Dr. D Roy Mahapatra,Assistant Professor, Dept. Of Aerospace Engg.Determined the optimum position for the placement of sensors and actuators for damaged beam or for a beam consisting of different materials.
profile_positions.title: Summer Project
